  • java.lang.Object
    • StreetFighter2017.SpriteFighter

  • public class SpriteFighter
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    iDVID this class represents each a player that can be showed on the game board

        public void setCol(int col)
        sets the walking column of this player, used to set the right column after the player stops walking
        Parameters:
        col - : the number of the column the function will change the current columnWalking to
